description:
While hiking, Conan and his friends meet campers Eiko, Ashizuka, Hayashida, and Takemi at a mountain cottage. The four of them have gathered to commemorate the death of their friend Motoki who accidentally fell to their death three years ago. Takemi, who camped by herself in a tent at the bottom of a cliff, is found murdered the next morning. The time of death is estimated between 3 AM to 5 AM, making it impossible for Eiko or Ashizuka to have killed her. Suspicion falls on weather station employee Hayashida who went to a nearby mountain to collect data in the middle of the night, but something about the case bothers Conan...
Source: crunchyroll
